Class DurbanStreetMaintenance

java.lang.Object
DurbanStreetMaintenance
public class DurbanStreetMaintenance extends Object
A class to report the total age of the people in each house and total age of the people in the street. The number of houses in the street and the number of people and their ages is input from the user.
Author:
Muhammad Ahsan Saleem

    • DurbanStreetMaintenance

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method asks the user for number of houses in the street, and then gets the number of people in each house alongside their ages. The method then computes and displays the total ages in each house and the sum of ages in the street.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used).

    • inputHouseNumbers

      private static void inputHouseNumbers(int[] houseNumbersArray)
      This method fills the houseNumbersArray with the house numbers entered by the user.
      Parameters:
      houseNumbersArray - The array to be filled with house numbers.

    • inputHouseAges

      private static void inputHouseAges(int[] houseNumbersArray, int[][] houseAgesArray)
      This method asks the user for the number of people in each house, and then fills the houseAgesArray with the ages of each person in the house.
      Parameters:
      houseNumbersArray - The array which contains house numbers.
      houseAgesArray - The 2-D which is has to be filled with the ages of each person in each house.
